newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh Bank 90-day T-bill yield 6.94 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh Bank 90-day T-bill yield 6.94 pct.

text.p: Bangladesh Bank, the country's central bank, sold 90-day Treasury bills worth 130 million taka with a corresponding yield of 6.94 percent against 6.99 percent previously at an auction on Sunday, a bank statement said.
The weighted average price against the bills was 98.29 taka per 100 taka against previous 98.28.

The bank also sold 30-day Treasury bills worth 360 million taka at an yield at 6.76 percent against 5.68 percent previously. The weighted average price was 99.44 taka per 100 taka against the previous 99.53.
